Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way, running north and south, intersects Lelion Way, which continues to the east and west. The fantastic Ashton River can be seen in the distance to the southwest, along with the Ashton Falls Resort, a fancy inn where the rich and famous spend their free time.
